amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase from 45 days to 75 days the maximum time allowed to conduct special elections.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 108-466 which seeks to strike the 45-day time frame for conducting special elections under the bill and substitutes a 75-day time frame.
